description:
An adversary may use legitimate desktop support and remote access software, such as Team Viewer, Go2Assist, LogMein, AmmyyAdmin, etc, to establish an interactive command and control channel to target systems within networks.
These services are commonly used as legitimate technical support software, and may be allowed by application control within a target environment.
Remote access tools like VNC, Ammyy, and Teamviewer are used frequently when compared with other legitimate software commonly used by adversaries. (Citation: Symantec Living off the Land)
author: frack113
Connor Martin
name: DNS Query To Remote Access Software Domain
query: (((dns.question.name:(/.*\.[Gg][Ee][Tt][Gg][Oo]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Ll][Oo][Gg][Mm][Ee][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Aa][Mm][Mm][Yy][Yy]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ss][Uu][Pp][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Mm][Oo][Tt][Ee][Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll][Ii][Tt][Ii][Ee][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]\.[Aa][Nn][Yy][Dd][Ee][Ss][Kk]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Aa][Pp][Ii]\.[Pp][Ll][Aa][Yy][Aa][Nn][Ee][Xx][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Rr][Ee][Ll][Aa][Yy]\.[Ss][Pp][Ll][Aa][Ss][Hh][Tt][Oo][Pp]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Aa][Pp][Ii]\.[Ss][Pp][Ll][Aa][Ss][Hh][Tt][Oo][Pp]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Aa][Pp][Pp]\.[Aa][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Aa][Gg][Ee][Nn][Tt][Rr][Ee][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg]\.[Aa][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ss][Uu][Bb]\.[Aa][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Ll][Oo][Gg][Mm][Ee][Ii][Nn][Cc][Dd][Nn]\.[Hh][Tt][Tt][Pp]\.[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Aa][Pp][Cc][Dd][Nn]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /.*[Ll][Oo][Gg][Mm][Ee][Ii][Nn]\-[Gg][Aa][Tt][Ee][Ww][Aa][Yy]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Cc][Ll][Ii][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Tt][Ee][Aa][Mm][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww][Ee][Rr]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Gg][Rr][Aa][Tt][Ee][Dd][Cc][Hh][Aa][Tt]\.[Tt][Ee][Aa][Mm][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww][Ee][Rr]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt][Ii][Cc]\.[Rr][Ee][Mm][Oo][Tt][Ee][Pp][Cc]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Nn]\-[Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Cc][Oo][Mm][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ee][Rr]\.[Cc][Oo][Rr][Pp][Oo][Rr][Aa][Tt][Ee]\.[Bb][Ee][Aa][Nn][Yy][Ww][Hh][Ee][Rr][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Ss][Ww][Ii]\-[Rr][Cc]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Ss][Ww][Ii]\-[Tt][Cc]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Tt][Ee][Ll][Ee][Mm][Ee][Tt][Rr][Yy]\.[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss]\.[Qq][Ee][Tt][Qq][Oo]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Ll][Aa][Yy]\.[Ss][Cc][Rr][Ee][Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\.[Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ww][Ii][Ss][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Ee][Xx][Pp][Rr][Ee][Ss][Ss]\.[Gg][Oo][Tt][Oo][Aa][Ss][Ss][Ii][Ss][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Aa][Uu][Tt][Hh][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\.[Ll][Oo][Gg][Mm][Ee][Ii][Nn][Ii][Nn][Cc]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Ss]\.[Vv][Nn][Cc]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Tt][Mm][Aa][Tt][Ee]\.[Ii][Oo]/ OR /.*[Aa][Pp][Ii]\.[Pp][Aa][Rr][Ss][Ee][Cc]\.[Aa][Pp][Pp]/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Rr][Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Mm][Oo][Tt][Ee][Dd][Ee][Ss][Kk][Tt][Oo][Pp]\-[Pp][Aa]\.[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee][Aa][Pp][Ii][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Ll][Oo][Gg][Mm][Ee][Ii][Nn]\-[Gg][Aa][Tt][Ee][Ww][Aa][Yy]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ee]\.[Ll][Oo][Gg][Mm][Ee][Ii][Nn][Rr][Ee][Ss][Cc][Uu][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Jj][Oo][Ii][Nn]\.[Zz][Oo][Hh][Oo]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Aa][Ss][Ss][Ii][Ss][Tt]\.[Zz][Oo][Hh][Oo]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Zz][Oo][Hh][Oo][Aa][Ss][Ss][Ii][Ss][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd][Ss]\.[Zz][Oo][Hh][Oo][Cc][Dd][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Aa][Gg][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Jj][Uu][Mm][Pp][Cc][Ll][Oo][Uu][Dd]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Kk][Ii][Cc][Kk][Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt]\.[Jj][Uu][Mm][Pp][Cc][Ll][Oo][Uu][Dd]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Cc][Dd][Nn]\.[Kk][Aa][Ss][Ee][Yy][Aa]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Ll][Aa][Yy]\.[Kk][Aa][Ss][Ee][Yy][Aa]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /.*[Ll][Ii][Cc][Ee][Nn][Ss][Ee]\.[Bb][Oo][Mm][Gg][Aa][Rr]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Bb][Ee][Yy][Oo][Nn][Dd][Tt][Rr][Uu][Ss][Tt][Cc][Ll][Oo][Uu][Dd]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/)) OR ((dns.question.name:/.*\.[Rr][Uu][Ss][Tt][Dd][Ee][Ss][Kk]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ AND dns.question.name:/[Rr][Ss]\-.*/))) AND (NOT ((process.executable:/.*\\\\[Bb][Rr][Aa][Vv][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee]\\\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ll][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee]\\\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ll][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Mm][Oo][Zz][Ii][Ll][Ll][Aa]\ [Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ff][Oo][Xx]\\\\[Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ff][Oo][Xx]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Mm][Oo][Zz][Ii][Ll][Ll][Aa]\ [Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ff][Oo][Xx]\\\\[Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee][Ff][Oo][Xx]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt]\ [Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\\\\[Ii][Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt]\ [Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\\\\[Ii][Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Mm][Aa][Xx][Tt][Hh][Oo][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee][Ww][Ee][Bb][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww]\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ll][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\\\.*/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Aa][Pp][Pp][Ss]\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee]\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ll][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\\\[Mm][Ss][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee]\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ll][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\\\[Mm][Ss][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)))) OR ((process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee][Cc][Oo][Rr][Ee]\\\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee][Cc][Oo][Rr][Ee]\\\\.*/) AND process.executable:(/.*\\\\[Mm][Ss][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Mm][Ss][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee][Ww][Ee][Bb][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww]2\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Oo][Pp][Ee][Rr][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Ss][Aa][Ff][Aa][Rr][Ii]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Ss][Ee][Aa][Mm][Oo][Nn][Kk][Ee][Yy]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Vv][Ii][Vv][Aa][Ll][Dd][Ii]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Ww][Hh][Aa][Ll][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))))
